description: Delete a raw material transaction sales customer
permissions: Admins can delete raw material transaction sales customers. Non-admin users can delete when they are a member of the related broker; the policy also allows deletion when customer or broker is missing, but validations may reject it.
side_effects: Deletes a raw material transaction sales customer record.
validation_notes: The raw material transaction sales customer ID argument is required. --confirm is required to delete a raw material transaction sales customer.
